content.text:
Karen L. Haas, Clerk of the House, reported and found truly enrolled 
a bill of the House of the following title, which was thereupon signed 
by the Speaker:

       H.R. 1329. An act to increase, effective as of December 1, 
     2017, the rates of compensation for veterans with service-
     connected disabilities and the rates of dependency and 
     indemnity compensation for the survivors of certain disabled 
     veterans, and for other purposes.
content.speaker: Unknown
